messages.subject: HURRICANE Help Needed from New Orleans member
messages.msgSnippet: Hi, Denise, who lives north of NEW ORLEANS has asked me to post a message.  If anyone can help them, it would be GREATLY appreciated.  Alison
messages.messageBody:
Hi,

Denise, who lives north of NEW ORLEANS has asked me to post a message. If anyone can
help them, it would be GREATLY appreciated. Alison abzb@... Here's the
message:

We've been staying in Houston and don't have a hotel room anymore so we're trying to get
into the Parish today. If we can't, is there anyone in the Baton Rouge area who could be a
back up for us to find us shelter. If you cab could you call Alison @ 310 828-5788 (home)
or 310 403-5788 (cell) and she can relay the message to me (Denise).

Thank you all for your help.

Denise
